name: Damage Dungeon
description:
Damage Dungeon is a short dungeon crawler game inspired by old school Zelda titles for the Game dev TV game jam, where the theme was "Death is only the beginning". 

We set up a system where the more enemies you kill, the more powerful the end of level boss is, making death only the beginning of the enemies trouble. The player must choose to either try and avoid the enemies, and make it to an easier boss fight, or take them all out on their journey!

*Disclaimer*

Uses the following asset pack from Synty for environment art: https://syntystore.com/products/simple-dungeons-cartoon-assets
